task.summary: Responsive Layout for different screen densities, also adjusting menu adapter to have icon
Complete overhaul of menu adapter, new menu with icon and headers available, also lower bar on menu for settings.
Using GetFavoriteLocations WebService, added Favorite Locations to Menu, removed deals web service until it is finished, now using android-query for image loading purposes
